EmailTemplate.name: Water Webinar - 040315
EmailTemplate.subject: AECOM Webinar: Toward Energy Neutrality
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR: TOWARD ENERGY NEUTRALITY
Water and wastewater treatment works have historically been one of the greatest energy consumers in a community, up to 4% of total power consumed in a city.
In the past 10 years, the emphasis has changed and technologies are now available that will move these major energy users to energy producers. Many plants are already approaching or achieving energy neutrality.
This lecture identifies the areas of treatment and types of technologies that can be employed cost-effectively at your treatment facilities.
Webinar details
On: 4 March 2015 Speaker: Ralph Eschborn, AECOM
All webinars are broadcast three times a day to enable global attendance:
15:00 GMT (10:00 ET) 20:00 GMT (15:00 ET) 3:00 GMT (22:00 ET)
Pre-register here for this free webinar. http://www.aecom.com/vgn-ext-templating/v/index.jsp?vgnextoid=6caeb1fe59e7b410VgnVCM100000089e1bacRCRD&vgnextchannel=969d1db9e0a60210VgnVCM1000004c6311acRCRD&vgnextfmt=default
From around the corner to around the globe, AECOM's team of dedicated professionals work to positively impact lives, transform communities and make the world a better place.
